note: Hey! 👋🏻 I'm Kyle 😄 I'm based in Seattle, Washington, and am currently working as a Product Manager at Cascade PBS developing websites and OTT (Streaming) apps. Recently I have been exploring an expansion of my presence on the web, which is why I find myself here! You can also find me across the web at all the links below. Feel free to reach out to chat if you find anything interesting here!
